individualBuffer(address).details: replenishes at rateLimitPerSecond per second up to bufferCap

params.to: the recipient address of the minted VOLT mints all VOLT that msg.sender has in the buffer

params.amount: the amount of VOLT to mint
params.to: the recipient address of the minted VOLT

addAddress(address,uint112,uint112).notice: add an authorized contract, its per second replenishment and buffer

addAddressWithCaps(address).notice: add an authorized contract, its per second replenishment and buffer set to the non governor caps

getBufferCap(address).notice: the cap of the buffer that can be used at once

getLastBufferUsedTime(address).notice: the last time the buffer was used by each address

getRateLimitPerSecond(address).notice: the rate per second for each address

individualBuffer(address).notice: the amount of action that can be used before hitting limit

mintMaxAllowableVolt(address).notice: mint VOLT to the target address and deplete the whole rate limited  minter's buffer, pausable and completely depletes the msg.sender's buffer

mintVolt(address,uint256).notice: function that all VOLT minters call to mint VOLT pausable and depletes the msg.sender's buffer

updateMaxBufferCap(uint256).notice: update the non gov max buffer cap

updateMaxRateLimitPerSecond(uint256).notice: update the non gov max rate limit per second
